description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The North Pole is in trouble and only you can help in ELFSQUAD7. Go solo or team up with your friends and family in a co-op Christmas adventure! Use your skills to stuff Santa's sac, smash freakish toys, fight Kevin - the haywire toy-building robot, and save Christmas for everyone!   Santa needs your help! ELFSQUAD7...ASSEMBLE!
